Text.val: -- Get Status Trx. Jika belum Settlement, Retry hingga 5x
-- Tanya user apakah ingin buka payment link kembali
IF Transaction has not created yet, not required to cancel
-- Verifikasi Signature Key Jika Settlement atau Capture

ExpSyntax.val: StrBuild( 'ts: @1@ ; pt: @2@ ; ti : @3@ ; sk : @4@ ; bk : @5@ ; bc : @6@ ; sdt : @7@ ; st : @8@', IF(ISNULL({0,18}), 'NULL', Trim({0,18})), IF(ISNULL({0,19}), 'NULL', Trim({0,19})), IF(ISNULL({0,20}), 'NULL', Trim({0,20})), IF(ISNULL({0,21}), 'NULL', Trim({0,21})), IF(ISNULL({0,24}), 'NULL', Trim({0,21})), IF(ISNULL({0,25}), 'NULL', Trim({0,21})), IF(ISNULL({0,36}), 'NULL', Trim(DStr({0,36}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))), IF(ISNULL({0,37}), 'NULL', Trim(TStr({0,37}, 'HH:MM:SS'))) )
MlsTrans('The payment hasn''t been settled yet. Do you want to retry?')
StrBuild( 'bn: @1@ ; va: @2@', IF(ISNULL({0,35}), 'NULL', Trim({0,35})), IF(ISNULL({0,52}), 'NULL', Trim({0,52})) )

Text.val: -- Proses Bank Name and Virtual Account Number
-- Get Bank Name from VA Numbers Array IF above not found
-- Get Windows AppData Folder masukan ke variable vAppData
-- Jika variable vAppData masih kosong, Get Temp Folder
-- Jika variable vAppData masih kosong, tampilkan error

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Are you sure to finish payment?')
'PASSED DATA: ' & Trim({0,1}) & Trim({0,2}) & Trim({0,3}) & Trim({0,4}) & Trim({0,5}) & Trim({0,6})
